amendment.description: To require a study on the financial impact of the mineral pyrrhotite in concrete home foundations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3651 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3651 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To require a study on the financial impact of the mineral pyrrhotite in concrete home foundations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3651 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3651 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
